website_summaries.verdict: Cleanser, makeup remover, and toner all in one.
pros: Hydrogen mineral water that removes makeup and impurities, and is especially good at cleaning off foundation
cons: Quite pricey, and users felt they needed to use a lot of product for effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered! Negative 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: The short round 8.5oz bottle is what I ordered and have repeatedly ordered time and time again because it has no odor, it removes all my makeup and I love how clean it makes my face feel. I did NOT receive what I ordered!!! Instead I received the tall 8.45oz bottle which does have an odor, reacts completely different on my skin in a negative way and the bottle leakes. It is NOT the same product! I've always loved all my orders from Amazon but if i could ide give this negative 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, lemony...not the Micro Water I’m used to
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: well, it’s back in stock at Sephora, and this is exactly the same. Evidently, Dr. Jart has changed the formula. It sucks. I want to believe this is the real thing, but it’s so different from the product I’ve bought from Sephora for the last two years. Unfortunately, Sephora isn’t stocking this anymore...which is why I turned to Amazon. Compared to the clean-feeling, odorless version I used to get at Sephora, this product left my skin sticky and had a distinct lemon scent to it. Did okay at removing my makeup, but not the fresh, clean feeling I’m used to with the product this is claiming to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Probably a fake
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with safety seals but the labeling is different from the image advertised. Mine says "Removes make-up & dirt + Brightens" whereas the one you buy at Sephora (and the image used to advertise) has "Removes make-up and impurities". Seems like a red flag for a fake product to me. . The first image shows what mine looks like as an example, second is Sephora's product image for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Gentle enough for Sensitive me
customer_reviews.text: Dr Jart makes the best water I’ve ever tried. Even the Simple & Dior & Clarins irritates my skin. I find with this one that isn’t an issue and it really removes all the makeup. My skin feels really clean after - it’s just the best one out there IMO. Not sure where Dr Jart got his start but they make 3 of my fave skincare products. Convenient to find it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Over 40 working mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a year and find it to be non-irritating on my skin, and does the job well. I use a "waterproof" eyeliner which requires a bit of gentle scrub, however, I really like this product for it's feeling of purity. After a long shift at work when I am too tired to do the proper face washing, I use it on my face and neck and find it does a decent job of preventing those "over 40" breakouts from getting out of control. No residue that is significant enough for this customer to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: NOT the real thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT real Dr. Jart micro water. I am returning. It has a STRONG lemon scent like a household cleaner. I tried it on a small area of my face and it felt like a residue left behind, and now that area is burning slightly. I’ll stick to purchasing from Sephora!
customer_reviews.author: 11yearsandcounting

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend with sensitive skin swears by it for removing waterproof makeup
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves this stuff, and buying it on Amazon is less than half the cost of getting it in the mall!! It works great to take off waterproof makeup without messing up her skin.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Jart keeps face fresh  & toned.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this to freshen up in the morning, after exercising and to remove my makeup. I especially loved buying this deal because Dr. Jart is not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like water, but man is it not! Removes every last bit of makeup, even eye makeup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It’s amazing!! Does everything and more than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tweed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Takes everything off with ease, even the waterproof makeup and doesn't irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.author: NatureGirl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go-to
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my favorite makeup remover/micellular water ever. Worth the price! Doesn’t leave that icky residue either, whether you rinse afterwards or not
customer_reviews.author: Megan Matsumura

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE it. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it. I would definitely recommend this product. I thought my face was clean after I washed it, but after using this product, I realized my face wasn't as clean as I thought. Amazing job on pores!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie L. Verkuyl

customer_reviews.title: this is really nice stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an eye make up remover (among other things) non-irritating and not oily. this is really nice stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M. Beltramo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value and great product less expensive than retail store also better selection of products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!! Can't say enough good things! Use it every morning and night. So gentle but definitely makes your face feel clean!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff work so good and has helped me keep my acne at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Marina C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than any micellar water I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I use this every evening after cleansing to ensure all the dirt has been removed from my face, and as a gentle cleanser in the morning to wipe off any sebum production overnight. I have LOVED this cleansing water! I even take it in a smaller bottle when traveling. This has made such a difference in reducing breakouts and lightly exfoliating my skin to make it makeup ready.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this each day. It is mild and gets my face clean, but not dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great micellar water
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried about 6 different brands of micellar water and this is my favorite so far. It's the only one that I've repurchased ! It takes off my make up, tones, and doesn't leave residue on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: perfect except the price
customer_reviews.text: I've only used cleansing oil so far, so I have no frame of reference in terms of cleansing water, but I've heard some great reviews about this product. I'm very happy with the product, but I'm not giving 5 stars because of the price. I think there are cheaper options out there that works just as well as this one.
customer_reviews.author: hla-c

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: Feels good! Dries my skin a bit...I need moisturizer after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.West

customer_reviews.title: No Safety Seal. Looks Used
customer_reviews.text: This product is written about on the bottle and box in Asian. I cannot tell if it was used or not as there is no seal on the bottle. The items were outside of their clear package which is very flimsy. I'm returning this and buying it from the actual company that makes it.
customer_reviews.author: MTMD

customer_reviews.title: a must have for a lazy girl
customer_reviews.text: this works wonders when it comes to getting makeup off and not leaving a greasy residue. it doesn't break me out either or leave my face bright red. i like to use this at night when i don't feel up to removing my makeup then washing my face and then toning. i still apply a moisturizer after though. i definitely recommend dr.jart micro water. you get a huge size plus the extra gift size and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly cleanses without drying skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a toner after cleansing and it removes all the leftover dirt and makeup without stripping away the moisture from my skin. It’s one if the most important steps of my daily skin care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica by the Beach

customer_reviews.title: not a knockoff. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: same as what I buy at Sephora, but at nearly half the cost. Came full, sealed, and same quality as the bottles i buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: AprilsRoses

customer_reviews.title: but removes makeup better than bioderma (but not as good as a special ...
customer_reviews.text: I used Bioderma Sensibio for 5 years and this is the first micellar water I switched to. It is gentle enough on my skin, causes no irritation, but removes makeup better than bioderma (but not as good as a special makeup remover, still it's just a micellar water). And I also like the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This Dr. Jart has cured my adult acne. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lajx2

customer_reviews.title: Works wondefully!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully in removing all types of make-up and leaves my face feeling clean without the tightness soaps can cause. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I use it daily. It doesn't dry out my skin, it doesn't sting, no strong cough-inducing fumes like some toners have...and it gets all that dirt and oil out of your pores! I'll never buy another toning liquid.
customer_reviews.author: AbracadabraFL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use as a makeup remover. Leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: the product is amazing for my acn prone
customer_reviews.text: I started to us Dr.Jart + dermaclear micro water since i started my face looks clean and soft .the product is amazing for my acn prone skin
customer_reviews.author: SIDEl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Use it to take my makeup off or a quite refresh. It doesn't bother my eyes or sensitive skin. Makes my fact feel really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Modlik

customer_reviews.title: I love this for removing eye make-up
customer_reviews.text: I love this for removing eye make-up. It has zero irritation, and removes even my waterproof mascara with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic amazing makeup remover/cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised by the other reviews--I LOVED this and thought it looked perfect when it arrived! I got the square bottle but that is what I was expecting at the time when I bought it (March) and it now seems that they maybe changed the bottle design. It's great to use right before face wash to remove makeup, I don't feel clean at night without it anymore! Highly recommend to anyone looking to start getting into a double-cleanse routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was so cheap but it is and I'm so happy! Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous that this was the real deal since it was so cheap but it is and I'm so happy! Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Akin

customer_reviews.title: Winner of a side by side comparison.
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I bought both the full and travel sized bottles of Garnier Skin Active Micellar cleansing water from the drugstore and then found my Birch box (monthly sample beauty subscription) waiting for me when I got home last night. So I took the opportunity to do a side by side comparison and took of half my face of makeup with that, and the other half with this brand by Dr. Jart+. There was no comparison, the Garnier side didn't remove my makeup nearly as well as this one did, and in fact I had to go over that side with this brand. Will definitely be purchasing this brand. Price is comparable to Sephora and other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I always buy it from Amazon. It's a much better price than the $32 Sephora charges for it and this includes more product. I also love what this has done for my skin. My face feel cleaner and my pores have reduced. I use it in the morning and night. I would recommend this to anyone. It also removed the hardest to remove mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Dr.Jart+ Dermaclear Micro Water 8.4oz + GIFT 5.1 oz
product_meta.description: A pure and natural all-in-one cleansing water that removes makeup and impurities while toning and brightening skin. What it is formulated to do: Dermaclear Micro Water is made with 85 percent active hydrogen mineral water instead of refined water and is formulated with 90 percent natural ingredients. This unique formula allows it to remove all impurities, makeup, and even mascara without irritation while it provides nutrients and superior moisturizing. Suitable for hypersensitive skins, the Derma Toning Complex leaves a fresh, clean feeling while toning and brightening. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates. Do not use in areas with injuries, eczema, or dermatitis. Keep out of reach of infants and children. Do not store in hot or cold place or in direct sunlight. This product is a facial cleansing water. DO NOT drink.
feature_bullets: Remove all impurities, makeup, and even mascara without irritation
